title: “A Minecraft Movie” Now Streaming on Max
description: The post “A Minecraft Movie” Now Streaming on Max appeared first on Xbox Wire.
author: Mike Nelson, Xbox Wire Editor
excerpt: Stream the action-adventure movie A Minecraft Movie on Max. Sign up for must-see series, movies, live sports, and breaking news.
text: Now StreamingThe first-ever big screen, live-action adaptation of Minecraft, the best-selling video game of all time.Plans start at $9.99/month.Sign Up NowWatch TrailerAlso Streaming With American Sign Language (ASL)Closed captions and audio description available on both versions.Learn MoreSynopsisFour misfits are unexpectedly pulled through a mysterious portal into the Overworld: a bizarre, cubic wonderland that thrives on imagination. To return home, they’ll have to master this new world — and protect it from evil things, like Piglins and Zombies — by embarking on a magical quest with an unexpected, expert crafter named Steve. Their adventure will challenge them to reconnect with the qualities that make them each uniquely creative.  Cast A Minecraft Movie GenreAction, Adventure, Kids & FamilyRating InformationPGExecutive ProducersTodd Hallowell, Kayleen Walters, Brian Mendoza, Jonathan Spaihts, Pete Chiappetta, Andrew Lary, Anthony TittanegroProducersRoy Lee, Jon Berg, Mary Parent, Cale Boyter, Jason Momoa, Jill Messick, Torfi Frans Olafsson, Vu BuiAbout This MovieFour misfits are pulled through a portal into a bizarre, cubic wonderland called the Overworld.
